title: Characterization of conformational states of the homodimeric enzyme fluoroacetate dehalogenase by 19F–13C two-dimensional NMR
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00176A, Paper
Open Access

Motasem Suleiman, Geordon A. Frere, Ricarda Törner, Lauren Tabunar, Gaurav Vijay Bhole, Keith Taverner, Nobuyuki Tsuchimura, Dmitry Pichugin, Roman J. Lichtenecker, Oleksandr Vozny, Patrick Gunning, Haribabu Arthanari, Adnan Sljoka, Robert S. Prosser
5-Fluoroanthranilic acid-(phenyl-13C6) is derived from 13C-enriched 4-fluoronitrobenzene and converted to the tryptophan analogue, allowing (19F,13C) TROSY spectroscopy (created with BioRender.com).
